name: Free Cando
description:
Cando's been arrested and sentenced to be recycled! Can you break Cando out of jail?  Type your way out of jail.. Made for Genre Mash Jam 2. NOTE: I tried to make the theme of Cando running to a reuse factory. but i over scoped and burned myself out in the processs, now theres 2 levels, and im gonna consider me not including the theme in this game.

Hi please be kind when playing this, i know i havent fully finished it but thats just how jams be sometimes. ill try to improve for the next game jam
